openCramInputStream

public static java.io.InputStream openCramInputStream(java.lang.String cramURL,
                                                      boolean decrypt,
                                                      java.lang.String password)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.net.URISyntaxException
A convenience method.

If a file is supplied then it will be wrapped into a SeekableStream. If file is null, then the fromIS argument will be used or System.in if null. Optionally the input can be decrypted using provided password or the password read from the console.

The method also checks for EOF marker and raise error if the marker is not found for files with version 2.1 or greater. For version below 2.1 a warning will be issued.

Parameters:
cramFile - CRAM file to be read
fromIS - input stream to be read
decrypt - decrypt the input stream
password - a password to use for decryption
Returns:
an InputStream ready to be used for reading CRAM file definition
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.net.URISyntaxException

readContainer

public static Container readContainer(CramHeader cramHeader,

Reads a CRAM container from the input stream. Returns an EOF container when there is no more data or the EOF marker found.
